title: Case Number
description: This refers to the police report number.

title: Crime Code
description: This is the local code utilized to report the offense.

title: Crime Description
description: This denotes the crime being reported. Notably, case numbers may encompass multiple crimes reported to law enforcement.

title: Reported Block Address
description: To safeguard the privacy of the victim, the block number of the location where the crime occurred is employed.

title: City of Incident
description: This indicates the city in which the crime was reported.

title: District
description: This specifies the Police District in which the crime took place.

title: Reported Date
description: This indicates the date the report was submitted to the police.

title: Reported Day of Week
description: This denotes the day of the week the report was made to the police.
